TopicTitle: Orbital Defense Initiative (O.D.I.N.) By Verviedi Stardrive

Articles.Content:
We've all been there. You are about to carry out your evil plan and suddenly BOOM! The hero stops you. But not today....

Introducing O.D.I.N! This satellite carries four gigantic laser cannons, capable of everything from annihilating cities to erupting volcanoes! Giant mobile city of death about to eat you and all of your cool gadgets? The O.D.I.N system will briefly wonder where New York and Chicago went, and then drop a giant yellow laser of death on it! Great for parties and making the Earth green again!

Inspired by Philip Reeve's book: A Darkling Plain.

Control systems not included.

Mods required:

SUNBEAM Lazor
